snippet: A five-year low in weekly applications for unemployment benefits cheered investors ahead of the April jobs numbers.
abstract: Stocks rise after weekly applications for unemployment benefits fall to five-year low, raising investor hopes that labor market is improving.
lead_paragraph: A five-year low in weekly applications for unemployment benefits cheered investors ahead of the April jobs numbers.

headline.main: Jobless Claims Report Helps Lift Market
headline.print_headline: Jobless Claims Report Helps Lift Market
